description:
* Christmas Budget keeps your holiday shopping for family and friends on budget, on time and on target.
    * No more excess budgets, missed relatives, or forgotten gifts!
    * Organize the festive season using this application.
    * Create separate groups for family, friends, colleagues etc.
    * You even have a countdown to the Christmas.
    * Password feature
    * Home screen gives a complete overview of your planning.

Features:

    * Countdown feature
    * Password
    * Create custom groups.
    * Set n track budgets for individual groups.
    * Will keep on updating it & all updates are free.
